description:
The best mobile app for booking tee times, GPS tracking, scoring and game analysis

Booking tee times 24/7 at more than 5,000 golf courses and resorts in the U.S. and internationally is now even easier with the new-and-improved, FREE GolfNow mobile app. Plus, gain access to all new GPS tracking, score keeping and game analysis features with an annual premium app membership.

App Features Include:
• Book tee times 24/7 at 5,000 golf courses worldwide
• Easily access Hot Deals tee times and save up to 80% off green fees
• NEW – Enhanced search capabilities let golfers find tee times near cities, landmarks and more
• NEW – Accurate distance yardages with GPS tracking at over 30,000 courses. Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
• NEW – Keep score for your foursome with several game play formats
• NEW – Post-round analysis and in-depth statistics to improve your game
• No calling or waiting - available instantly anytime, anywhere
• Reservations count toward GolfNow Rewards status
• Use your device GPS or search by area to quickly find a course near home or on the road 
• Icons for tee time amenities at a glance (includes cart, 9 holes, etc.) 
• Save your credit card info for secure, easy, convenient booking at the tap of a finger
• Get directions to the golf course using the GolfNow Map View
trackCensoredName: GolfNow - Golf GPS Tracker, Tee Times, Scorecard, Range Finder & Golf Course Deals
trackName: GolfNow - Golf GPS Tracker, Tee Times, Scorecard, Range Finder & Golf Course Deals
releaseNotes:
• Optimizations for iOS 8
• Search for tee times by 9 or 18 holes
• Improved the overall display of tee time search results
• New Map View of tee time search results
• Tee time search results show distance to golf course
• And many other tweaks and fixes!
